 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּס‎</span>] **verb** ==pity, look upon with compassion== (Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּס‎</span> ***pity, spare***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—û s,***</u></abbr> in proper names compare [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 181</sup>) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָסָה‎</span> [[Ezek.16.5|Ezek 16:5]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַ֫סְתָּ‎</span> [[Jonah.4.10|Jonah 4:10]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחוּס‎</span> [[Jer.21.7|Jer 21:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחֹס‎</span> [[Ps.72.13|Ps 72:13]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחוּס‎</span> [[Isa.13.18|Isa 13:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּהוֺס‎</span> [[Deut.7.16|Deut 7:16]] + 9 t.([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72»§ 72</sup> R 4 [[BDB#Bö|Bö]]<sup>§ 1133</sup>(2)); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחֹס‎</span> [[Gen.45.20|Gen 45:20]]; [[Ezek.9.5|Ezek 9:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֫חָס‎</span> [[1Sam.24.11|1Sam 24:11]]; [[Ezek.20.17|Ezek 20:17]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָחוּס‎</span> [[Jer.13.14|Jer 13:14]] + 2 t.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּ֫סָה‎</span> [[Joel.2.17|Joel 2:17]]; [[Neh.13.22|Neh 13:22]]: — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of the eye, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עין‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(לא) תח(ו)ס על‎</span> the eye ***shall (not) look with compassion, pity, upon*** [[Deut.7.16|Deut 7:16]]; [[Deut.13.9|Deut 13:9]]; [[Deut.19.13|Deut 19:13]];   [[Deut.20.17|Deut 20:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לא חסה עָלַיִךְ עין‎</span> [[Ezek.16.5|Ezek 16:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינְכֶם אַלתָּֿחֹס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכְּֿלֵיכֶם‎</span>[[Gen.45.20|Gen 45:20]] ([[BDB#R|R]]<sup>JE</sup>) ***let not your eye look with regret upon your stuff***; with ellipsis of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיִן‎</span> [[1Sam.24.11|1Sam 24:11]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאָחֻס‎</span>, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּחָס‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); with ellipsis of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> [[Deut.19.21|Deut 19:21]]; [[Deut.25.12|Deut 25:12]]; [[Ezek.5.11|Ezek 5:11]]; [[Ezek.7.9|Ezek 7:9]]; [[Ezek.8.18|Ezek 8:18]]; [[Ezek.9.10|Ezek 9:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(אל) ע֯ל תחס עיני֯כם‎</span> [[Ezek.9.5|Ezek 9:5]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of God <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוסה על‎</span> [[Neh.13.22|Neh 13:22]]; [[Joel.2.17|Joel 2:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לא אחוס על נינוה‎</span> [[Jonah.4.11|Jonah 4:11]] ellipsis of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Jer.13.14|Jer 13:14]]; [[Ezek.24.14|Ezek 24:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of man: the Messianic king <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלדַּֿל וְאֶבְיוֺן‎</span> [[Ps.72.13|Ps 72:13]] ***he shall have pity on poor and needy***, Nebuchadrezzar <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עליהם‎</span> (i.e. on Zedekiah and the people) [[Jer.21.7|Jer 21:7]] Jonah, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על הקיקיון‎</span> [[Jonah.4.10|Jonah 4:10]]. — See also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חמל‎</span>. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺף‎</span>see below II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חפף‎</span>.
